about:
Hi Guys I Am DragonSteve142 I Hope To Be A Jr Mod Very Much Here's My Application
Minecraft Username: DragonSteve142
Why do you believe you should be a moderator for Avicus?: The Other Day My Friend Holden58 Was in The Other Team So I Raged And Killed As Many As 50 People with 20 Deaths Only But I Didn't Kill Him :P
How would you benefit the Avicus staff team?: I Feel That If I Can Be A Mod I Would Be Really Kind But Hacked Clients? Nah Temp Ban I Will Try My Best And Always Be A Good Jr Mod
If a player is using a hacked client on the server what in your opinion would be the most appropriate punishment?:  Temp Ban
If a player is swearing and being abusive on the server what in your opion would be the most appropriate punishment?: Kick
If a player is team griefing or team spleefing on the server what in your opinion would be the most appropriate punishment?: 1st Warning (Kick)
Do you have the ability to record video?: Yes
Do you own a microphone and have access to TeamSpeak 3 and Skype?: Yes Skype, However I am A Kid I Would Need To Ask Permission But Don't Worry I Will Be The Best Jr Mod Just Perfect I Need To Go To School Though


Skype: Chai Soon Hang Youtube: Hao Zhi Chai Twitter: DragonSteve142
